body:
Second plan is easy. But this plan has one problem.

first:
https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/activerecord/lib/active_record/inheritance.rb#L173

replace
```
subclass_name = attrs.with_indifferent_access[inheritance_column]
```
to
```
subclass_name = attrs[inheritance_column.to_s] ||  attrs[inheritance_column.to_sym]
```

second:
https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/activemodel/lib/active_model/dirty.rb#L122

replace
```
ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess[changed.map { |attr| [attr, attribute_change(attr)] }]
```
to
```
Hash[changed.map { |attr| [attr, attribute_change(attr)] }]
```

But The #changes method behavior is changeed . This is problem .

Please wait about first plan. I'm so sleepy :sleepy: .
